avg_price.name: avg_price
avg_price.description: Average price traded on the day.

total_num.name: total_num
total_num.description: Total number of trades executed on the day.

total_volume.name: total_volume
total_volume.description: Total trading volume for the underlying ticker on the day.

buy_volume.name: buy_volume
buy_volume.description: Total volume of buy trades executed for the underlying ticker on the day.

sell_volume.name: sell_volume
sell_volume.description: Total volume of sell trades executed for the underlying ticker on the day.

neut_volume.name: neut_volume
neut_volume.description: Total volume of neutral trades executed for the underlying ticker on the day.

buy_pct.name: buy_pct
buy_pct.description: The percentage of buy volume for the underlying ticker (65%+ = accumulation condition).

sell_pct.name: sell_pct
sell_pct.description: The percentage of sell volume for the underlying ticker (65%+ = fire sale condition).

neut_pct.name: neut_pct
neut_pct.description: The percentage of neutral volume for the underlying ticker (65%+ = neutral zone condition).
